name: Momotarou Dentetsu 11: Black Bombee Shutsugen! No Maki
name_original: Momotarou Dentetsu 11: Black Bombee Shutsugen! No Maki
description: Momotarō Dentetsu 11: Black Bombee Shutsugen! No Maki (桃太郎電鉄11～ブラックボンビー出現!の巻) is a video game in the Momotaro Dentetsu series of board game-style video games, genre released in 2002 by Hudson Soft for the PlayStation 2 and Nintendo GameCube. The game was only released in Japan.
